Package it.polimi.ingsw.network

Class LocalView

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.network.LocalView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    View, java.rmi.Remote
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DummyViewGUI, ViewBot, ViewCLI
    public abstract class LocalView
extends java.lang.Object
implements View
    This class represents a local view.

      • connectServer

        protected void connectServer​(java.lang.String address,
                             int port,
                             ConnectionType type)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Make new connection to the server.
        Parameters:
        address - Address of the server.
        port - Port of the server.
        type - Type of connection.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - If there is a network error.
        java.io.IOException

      • getServer

        protected Server getServer()
        Method to get a reference to the remote server. This method can be called only after creating a successful connection either using RMI or sockets.
        Returns:
        Remote server.

        Select a between list of objects.

      • showMessage

        public abstract void showMessage​(java.lang.String message)
        Show a message. This method doesn't throw RemoteException because this is a local view.
        Specified by:
        showMessage in interface View
        Parameters:
        message - Massage to be shown.

        Specified by:

        Parameters:

      • ping

        public void ping()
        Method used to check if connection is up. Shouldn't do anything. When the first ping is received, the timer is started.
        Specified by:
        ping in interface View

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
        Signal a disconnection from the server. This method doesn't throw RemoteException because this is a local view.
        Specified by:
        disconnect in interface View

      • closeConnection

        public void closeConnection()
        Close the connection to the server and stop the timer.
